parameters.name: AdviceDate
parameters.description: The date when the suggestion is generated. Specify the date in the yyyyMMdd format. The date must be in UTC.

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The display language of the suggestion. Default value: zh. Valid values:

*   **zh**: simplified Chinese
*   **en**: English
*   **ja**: Japanese
*   **zh-tw**: traditional Chinese

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 30. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
